document.full_text: a bomb blast ripped into a nigerian election office on friday, killing at least 10 people and wounding a dozen more just hours before a new attempt to hold a delayed ballot.
document.title: deadly bombing mars new attempt at nigerian poll
lines_and_colors: a bomb blast ripped into a nigerian election office on friday, killing at least 10 people and wounding a dozen more just hours before a new attempt to hold a delayed ballot.
